mapper.select: select id, kf_patrol_item_id, item_describe, chekc_method, item_score, item_sort, remarks, delete_flag, create_time, create_user_uuid, modify_time, modify_user_uuid, update_time from kf_patrol_item_detail where id = #{id}

select id, kf_patrol_item_id, item_describe, chekc_method, item_score, item_sort, remarks, delete_flag, create_time, create_user_uuid, modify_time, modify_user_uuid, update_time from kf_patrol_item_detail limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into kf_patrol_item_detail(kf_patrol_item_id, item_describe, chekc_method, item_score, item_sort, remarks, delete_flag, create_time, create_user_uuid, modify_time, modify_user_uuid, update_time) values (#{kfPatrolItemId}, #{itemDescribe}, #{chekcMethod}, #{itemScore}, #{itemSort}, #{remarks}, #{deleteFlag}, #{createTime}, #{createUserUuid}, #{modifyTime}, #{modifyUserUuid}, #{updateTime})

insert into kf_patrol_item_detail(kf_patrol_item_id, item_describe, chekc_method, item_score, item_sort, remarks, delete_flag, create_time, create_user_uuid, modify_time, modify_user_uuid, update_time) values
(#{entity.kfPatrolItemId}, #{entity.itemDescribe}, #{entity.chekcMethod}, #{entity.itemScore}, #{entity.itemSort}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.deleteFlag}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createUserUuid}, #{entity.modifyTime}, #{entity.modifyUserUuid}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into kf_patrol_item_detail(kf_patrol_item_id, item_describe, chekc_method, item_score, item_sort, remarks, delete_flag, create_time, create_user_uuid, modify_time, modify_user_uuid, update_time) values
(#{entity.kfPatrolItemId}, #{entity.itemDescribe}, #{entity.chekcMethod}, #{entity.itemScore}, #{entity.itemSort}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.deleteFlag}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createUserUuid}, #{entity.modifyTime}, #{entity.modifyUserUuid}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update kf_patrol_item_id = values(kf_patrol_item_id) , item_describe = values(item_describe) , chekc_method = values(chekc_method) , item_score = values(item_score) , item_sort = values(item_sort) , remarks = values(remarks) , delete_flag = values(delete_flag) , create_time = values(create_time) , create_user_uuid = values(create_user_uuid) , modify_time = values(modify_time) , modify_user_uuid = values(modify_user_uuid) , update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update kf_patrol_item_detail
kf_patrol_item_id = #{kfPatrolItemId},
item_describe = #{itemDescribe},
chekc_method = #{chekcMethod},
item_score = #{itemScore},
item_sort = #{itemSort},
remarks = #{remarks},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_user_uuid = #{createUserUuid},
modify_time = #{modifyTime},
modify_user_uuid = #{modifyUserUuid},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
